0P000070MX.TO.manager_bio: Mr. Smith joined Franklin Templeton Investments Private Client Group in February 1996, where he is currently Chief Investment Officer and Portfolio Manager for the Quotential Program. Mr. Smith is a graduate of the University of New Brunswick (B.BA, 1986) and received his Chartered Financial Analyst designation in 1999.

0P000070W1.TO.manager_bio: Bob Swanson is a vice president and portfolio manager with Pyramis Global Advisors, a Fidelity Investments company. He is a CFA charterholder and a member of the Chicago Quantitative Alliance, Boston Security Analysts Society, and the Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts.
